column4: ... Fine.    I shall repeat my situation on one line.   I had my net working.   I did the updates.  I restarted.  Now my network keeps blanking my DHCP ID and it won't let me save it.   In addition i have an unmodifiable ifupdown (eth0) how do i get rid of it and input my DHCP ID into eth1 so i can connect to the internet?
